text: George Soros ( or ; ; born August 12, 1930, as Schwartz György) is a Hungarian-American business magnate, investor, and philanthropist.http://www.companydirectorcheck.com/george-soros List of companies related to George Soros He is the chairman of Soros Fund Management. He survived the Nazi occupation of Budapest, before moving to London and studying at the London School of Economics. ==Career== Soros is a well-known supporter of progressive-liberal political causes.Shawcross, William (September 1, 1997). "Turning Dollars into Change" . Time. Between 1979 and 2011, Soros gave away over $8 billion to causes related to human rights, public health, and education. He played a significant role in the peaceful transition from communism to capitalism in Hungary (1984–89) and founded Europe's Central European University in Budapest, providing the initial endowment to open the first campus."Hungary: Soros Donates $250 Million to University in Budapest". Soros is also the chairman of the Open Society Foundations. ==Personal life== Soros was married to Annaliese Witschak from 1960 until they divorced in 1983. They had three children. Then, Soros was married to Susan Weber Soros from 1983 until they divorced in 2005. They had two children. Soros is now married to Tamiko Bolton since 2013. Soros is a supporter of the Democratic Party.
